Description:
Room For The Whole Family
This great sized four bedroom home, located in a quiet court on a flat block with over 700m2 (approx) on offer, has it all.

The backyard is big enough for the kids to play in and there is plenty of parkland surrounding this home to walk the dog, kick a footie and/or ride a bike.
This is one very special home, so ring now to arrange an inspection.
